1208250.name: Story of a Gladiator - Soundtrack
1208250.description:
The Story of a Gladiator soundtrack was composed and arranged by veteran video game composer Barry Leitch.
Barry has worked on hundreds of video games across the last 31 years.

Tacklist
01 - Story Of A Gladiator Title Theme.mp3
02 - Story Of A Gladiator Vocal Stinger.mp3
03 - Intro Instrumental.mp3
04 - The Roman Town.mp3
05 - The Drums of Greece.mp3
06 - The Drums of Africa.mp3
07 - The Drums of Rome.mp3
08 - Outro Instrumental.mp3
09 - Trailer Instrumental.mp3
10 - Intro with Sam Mowry.mp3
11 - Trailer With Sam Mowry.mp3
12 - Outro with Sam Mowry.mp3
1208250.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
